iview::IMouseActionObserver Class Reference

Common interface for all shapes which are mouse events receiver. More...

#include <IMouseActionObserver.h>

Detailed Description

Common interface for all shapes which are mouse events receiver.

Definition at line 22 of file IMouseActionObserver.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool iview::IMouseActionObserver::OnMouseButton ( istd::CIndex2d  position,
Qt::MouseButton  buttonType,
bool  downFlag 
) [pure virtual]

It is called, when mouse button is pushed down or up on this object.

Parameters:
position- position of mouse pointer on client area (picture coords).
downFlag- true, if mouse button is pushed down, false if pushed up.
Returns:
true if this shape should get focus to catch all mouse movements.

Implemented in iview::CViewBase, iview::CInteractiveParallelogramShape, iview::CInteractiveTransformableRectangleShape, iview::CTransformableRectangleCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractivePolygonShape, iview::CPolygonCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractiveLabelShape, iview::TMultiPolylineCalibrationShape< SegmentData >, iview::CInteractiveShapeBase, iview::TInteractiveMultiPolylineShape< SegmentData >, iview::CInteractiveArrowShape, iview::CInteractiveRectangleShape, iview::CNoneCalibrationShape, iview::CPinCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractivePinShape, iview::CInteractiveAnnulusShape, iview::CPolylineCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractiveCenterPinShape, iview::CInteractivePerspectiveCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractiveCircleShape, iview::CInteractiveAnnulusSegmentShape, and iview::CInteractivePolylineShape.

virtual bool iview::IMouseActionObserver::OnMouseMove ( istd::CIndex2d  position) [pure virtual]

It is called, when mouse is moved.

Only objects with focus receive this event.

Parameters:
position- position of mouse pointer on client area (picture coords).
Returns:
true if this shape should hold focus to catch longer all mouse movements.

Implemented in iview::CViewBase, iview::CInteractiveParallelogramShape, iview::CInteractiveTransformableRectangleShape, iview::CTransformableRectangleCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractivePolygonShape, iview::CPolygonCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractiveLabelShape, iview::CInteractiveShapeBase, iview::CInteractiveArrowShape, iview::CInteractiveRectangleShape, iview::CNoneCalibrationShape, iview::CPinCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractivePinShape, iview::CInteractiveAnnulusShape, iview::CInteractiveCenterPinShape, iview::CInteractivePerspectiveCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractiveCircleShape, and iview::CInteractiveAnnulusSegmentShape.
